appropedia-policies: Text of the Policies link in the footer
appropedia-contact: Text of the Contact link in the footer
appropedia-admin-panel: Text of the Admin panel link in the sidebar
appropedia-page-edit-warning: Warning message when editing a page
appropedia-anon-edit-warning: Warning message when editing a page anonymously
appropedia-user-edit-warning: Warning message when editing a user page other than your own
appropedia-interface-edit-warning: Warning message when editing a page in the MediaWiki namespace
appropedia-template-edit-warning: Warning message when editing a template
appropedia-create-page: Text of the button to create this page when following a red link
appropedia-not-own-work: Message when uploading a file through the simplified upload form of the visual editor
appropedia-download-pdf: Text of the button to print or download the current page as PDF
appropedia-searchprofile-pages: Text of the search tab for content pages
appropedia-searchprofile-files: Text of the search tab for file pages
appropedia-searchprofile-users: Text of the search tab for user pages
appropedia-searchprofile-talks: Text of the search tab for talk pages
appropedia-searchprofile-other: Text of the search tab for other pages
